resources.string: Transactions, Saved posts, Orders, Ads and other details

Terms
and
Privacy policy
.

By tapping \"LOG IN\" you agree to Crony\'s
Terms
and
Privacy policy
.
Password should contain atleast 1 digit, 1 special character, 1 small and 1 capital alphabet and no spaces.
(Verify your account by uploading College ID card image, your info will automatically be updated after verification)
Pay money at stores partnered with Crony
Transfer money to your friends or\nany other Crony user
Add money to Crony wallet and go cashless

Once posted you won\'t be able to edit the Advertisement
To get your Advertisement live in Crony Market, Drop your item at Nearest Warehouse and for more details go to My Advertisements

string-array.name: quotes
string-array.item: \"An obstacle is often a stepping stone.\"\n-Prescott
\"It\'s hard to beat a person who never gives up.\"\n-Babe Ruth
\"The future starts today, not tomorrow.\"\n-Pope John Paul II
\"Name the greatest of all inventors. Accident.\"\n-Mark Twan
\"Believe you can and you\'re half way there."\n-T. Roosevelt
\"If you can dream it, you can do it.\"\n-Walt Disney
\"Never give up on your dreams.\"\n-Anonymous
\"It\'s not the money, I\'m after it\'s freedom.\"\n-Anonymous
\"Look in the mirror. That\'s your competition.\"\n-Anonymous
\"An eye for eye only ends up making the whole world blind.\"\n-M.K. Gandhi
\"Be the change you wan\'t to see in the world.\"\n-Gandhiji
\"If you wan\'t to shine like a sun. First burn like a sun.\"\n-A.P.J Abdul Kalam
\"The key to CHANGE…is to let go of FEAR.\"\n-Rosanne Cash
\"Nothing is to be feared, it is only to be understood.\"\n-Marie Curie
\"Week people revenge. Strong people forgive. Intelligent people ignore.\"\n-Albert Einstein
\"Intelligence is the ability to adapt the change.\"\n-Stephen Hawking
\"Imagination is more important than knowledge.\"\n-Albert Einstein
\"Once you stopped learning, you start dying.\"\n-Albert Einstein
\"We realise the importance of our voices only when we are silenced.\"\n-Malala Yousafzai
\"Life is what happens when you\'re busy making other plans.\"\n-John Lennon
\"Have no fear of perfection, you will never reach it.\"\n-Salvador Dali
\"The best way to predict the future is to create it.\"\n-Abraham Lincoln
\"I walk slowly, but I never walk backward.\"\n-Abraham Lincoln
\"You need to know what to do when the sun is not shining.\"\n-Robert Downey Jr.
\"You are the creator of your own destiny.\"\n-Anonymous
\"You\'re amazing REMEMBER THAT.\"\n-Anonymous
\"Creativity is contagious, pass it on.\"\n-Albert Einstein
\"We build too many walls and not enough bridges.\"\n-Issac Newton
\"One good thing about music, when it hits you, you feel no pain.\"\n-Bob Marley
\"You can do anything if you\'ve enthusiasm.\"\n-Henry Ford
\"To improve is to change: to be perfect is to change often.\"\n-Winston Churchill
\"I am a big believer that technology shapes mankind.\"\n-Mukesh Ambani
\"You can\'t get into business for the fashion of it.\"\n-Azim Premji
\"Their is only one religion in the world i.e. Hardwork.\"\n-Shahrukh Khan
\"Don\'t become a philosopher before you become rich.\"\n-Shahrukh Khan
\"I\'ve not failed, I\'ve just found 10 thousand ways that won\'t work.\"\n-T.A. Edison
\"Great companies are built on great products.\"\n-Elon Musk
\"Only Engineers and Architects can see hidden lines and missing curves.\"\n-Anonymous
\"If your dreams don\'t scare you, they aren\'t big enough.\"\n-Muhammad Ali
\"Float like a butterfly, Sting like a bee.\"\n-Muhammad Ali
\"Don\'t count the days, make the days count.\"\n-Muhammad Ali
\"The power to question is the basis of all human progress.\"\n-Indira Gandhi
\"Arise! Awake! and stop not until the goal is reached.\"\n-Swami Vivekananda
\"Everything is easy when you\'re busy, Nothing is easy when you\'re lazy.\"\n-Swami Vivekananda
\"Kuch aisa likhen jo padne layak ho or kuch aisa karen jo likhne layak ho. \"\n-Anonymous
\"Insaan Mann se viklang hota hai shareer se nhi.\"\n-Anonymous
\"Har ek din wo cheej karo jo aapko daraati hai.\"\n-Anonymous
\"Murkh doosro par haste hain, buddhimaan khud par.\"\n-Anonymous
\"The best way out is always through.\"\n-Robert Frost
\"Experience is what you get when you don\'t get what you want.\"\n-Dan Standford
\"Fall seven time, get up eight.\"\n-Japanese proverb
\"Difference between ordinary and extraordinary is that little EXTRA.\"\n-Anonymous
\"Life is trying things to see if they work.\"\n-Ray Bradbury
\"If you\'re going through hell, keep going.\"\n-Winston Churchill
\"Life is a journey, not a race. Walk through it.\"\n-Anonymous
\"Push yourself because, no-one else is going to do it for you.\"\n-Anonymous
\"The body achieves what the mind believes.\"\n-Anonymous
\"People will laugh at your dreams, then hate you when you make them come true.\"\n-Anonymous
\"97% of the people who quit too soon are employed by 3% who never give up.\"\n-Anonymous
\"When you have a million dollar vision who surround yourself with 1cent minds.\"\n-Anonymous
\"The problem is not the problem. The problem is your attitude about the problem.\"\n-Johnny Depp
\"Don\'t call it a dream call it a plan.\"\n-Anonymous
\"Never accept anything less than you deserve. Remember, you teach people how to treat you.\"\n-Anonymous
\"The only limits in the life are the ones you create.\"\n-Anonymous
\"Falling down is an accident. Staying down is a choice.\"\n-Anonymous
\"The happiest people in the life are the givers, not the getters.\"\n-Anonymous
\"To live a creative life, we must loose our fear of being wrong.\"\n-J.C. Pearce
\"It does not matter how slowly you go, as long as you do not stop.\"\n-Confucius
\"Choose a job you love, and you\'ll never have to work in your life.\"\n-Confucius
\"Life doesn\'t get easier you just get stronger.\"\n-Anonymous
\"Your worst battle is between what you know and what you feel.\"\n-Anonymous
\"Be their for others, but never leave yourself behind.\"\n-Dodinsky
\"Integrity is choosing your thoughts and actions based on values rather than personal gain.\"\n-Anonymous
\"Their is a voice that doesn\'t use words. Listen.\"\n-Anonymous
\"There are 360 degrees, so why stick to one?\"\n-Zaha Hadid
\"I really believe in the idea of the future.\"\n-Zaha Hadid
